author: Anonymous Atom
title: Test File Trouble
question:
I entered my username (not the email) for the test file on DrRacket, and after clicking hand in it says "login error: bad username (my username)". I also tried entering my email and that did not work either. How should I fix this issue? 
Thanks in advance!
instructor_answer: You need to do the steps on the setup page in order, and specifically you need to do the run-getacct step before trying to use handin.
